education: Bachelor’s or Master’s in Computer Science, Data Science, Statistics, or related field
summary: Build data-driven solutions that help business teams make better decisions using analytics and machine learning.
responsibilities: Collect, clean, and analyze structured and unstructured data; Develop and validate machine learning models for prediction and classification; Translate business problems into analytical solutions; Communicate insights through dashboards and reports; Collaborate with engineering teams to deploy models into production.
required_skills: Python, SQL, Machine Learning, Statistics, Pandas, Scikit-learn, Data Visualization
preferred_skills: Deep Learning, Spark, MLOps, Cloud Platforms (AWS, GCP, Azure)

education: Bachelor’s in Computer Science, Information Technology, or related field
summary: Design and build scalable backend services that power web and mobile applications.
responsibilities: Develop RESTful APIs using Python frameworks; Design and optimize relational databases; Integrate third-party APIs and internal services; Implement authentication, logging, and error handling; Collaborate with frontend developers and product managers.
required_skills: Python, Flask, Django, REST APIs, PostgreSQL, Git, Unit Testing
preferred_skills: Docker, Kubernetes, CI/CD, Message Queues (Kafka, RabbitMQ)

education: Bachelor’s or Master’s in Computer Science, Artificial Intelligence, or related field
summary: Productionize machine learning models to deliver reliable and scalable AI-powered features.
responsibilities: Convert research models into production-ready services; Build data pipelines for training and inference; Optimize model performance and latency; Implement CI/CD pipelines for ML workflows; Monitor model performance and data drift.
required_skills: Python, Scikit-learn, TensorFlow or PyTorch, MLflow, Docker, Cloud Platforms
preferred_skills: Feature Stores, Kubeflow, Airflow, A/B Testing, Model Monitoring

education: Bachelor’s in Statistics, Mathematics, Economics, or related field
summary: Analyze data and create dashboards that support business decision-making.
responsibilities: Create dashboards and recurring reports; Perform exploratory data analysis to identify trends; Define KPIs with stakeholders; Ensure data quality and consistency; Document metrics and reporting logic.
required_skills: SQL, Excel, Power BI or Tableau, Data Cleaning, Business Analysis
